TopicTitle: Space station wall protective cushion padding with mesh net

Articles.Content: Hey what's up. Try googling for this stuff and it is impossible.... Looking to get some protective wall cushion padding like that in a space launch module on the walls.... even where to get the thick mesh net around it... To put this stuff on walls and essentially recreate a space station module interior prop. Can't find this stuff anywhere or even a term for it or a reference to it... Help please?

The interior of the ISS is mostly covered with lockers and ISPR racks, plus various experiment equipment, not padding.

Padding is used inside Soyuz:

But Apollo or the Shuttle didn't have any interior padding.
